Package com.hp.autonomy.hod.client.api.authentication

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuthenticationService
    Service for making authentication requests to HP Haven OnDemand
    EntityType
    Interface representing possible entities which could be authenticated by an AuthenticationToken.
    TokenType
    Interface representing possible types for an AuthenticationToken.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApiKey
    An API Key which can be used to obtain a token from HP Haven OnDemand
    ApplicationAndUsers
    An application and a list of users who can authenticate to that application.
    ApplicationAndUsers.User
    A representation of a user returned from an authenticate combined GET request.
    AuthenticationServiceImpl
    Default implementation of AuthenticationService
    AuthenticationToken<E extends EntityType,T extends TokenType>
    A token which can be used to authorise requests to Haven OnDemand.
    AuthenticationToken.Json
    Type representing the JSON representation of an authentication token as returned from Haven OnDemand.
    AuthenticationType
    Represents an HP Haven OnDemand authentication type.
    SignedRequest
    Represents a request to HP Haven OnDemand which must be made from a user's browser.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EntityType.Application
    Entity type for application tokens.
    EntityType.Combined
    Entity type for combined tokens.
    EntityType.CombinedSso
    Entity type for combined SSO tokens.
    EntityType.Developer
    Entity type for developer tokens.
    EntityType.Unbound
    Entity type for unbound tokens.
    EntityType.User
    Entity type for user tokens.
    TokenType.HmacSha1
    Token type for tokens which must be used as part of an HMAC SHA1 signed request.
    TokenType.Simple
    Token type for simple tokens which do not need signing.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    HodAuthenticationFailedException
